alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greenville Mountains; Northern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greenville and west central Spartanburg Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Columbus, or near Lake Robinson, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greer, Taylors, Duncan, Tigerville, Lake Robinson, Lyman, Paris Mountain State Park, Gowensville and Glassy Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greenville Mountains; Northern Spartanburg
